title: Heath Cummings on Colts-Patriots, Week 5, Stephen Oh on gambling DFS sleepers (Football 10/04)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Heath Cummings to break down the best bets in fantasy for the upcoming Week 5, including what to do with Rob Gronkowski, and who might be good streaming options at QB. Then Stephen Oh of SportsLine joins the program to break down the best DFS sleepers and what over/unders might be good picks for this week.

itunes:subtitle: Heath Cummings joins Will Brinson to preview Patriots-Colts and go over more Week 5 games before Stephen Oh joins the show to talk DFS sleepers and the best over/under picks for the week.
